title: Expressionism
creator_credit: George Barford, Egons Tomsons and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Traces the development of the basically German Expressionist Movement which exaggerated both color and form to express emotional and psychological attitudes. Includes the work of Munch, Kirchner, Heckel, Schmidt-Rottluff, Nolde, Pechstein, Kokoschka, Bdckmann, Kandinsky, Marc and Klee. Suitable for secondary level.
